mapper.select: select w.itemCode, i.iName, i.sido, i.infoText, i.state, ia.sysFile, (select min(price) from itemdetail id where w.itemCode = id.itemCode) as price from wishlist w join item i on w.itemCode = i.itemCode join itematt ia on ia.itemCode = w.itemCode join itemdetail id on id.itemCode = w.itemCode where w.userCode = #{userCode} and ia.itemType = 'WH';
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where userCode = #{userCode} and itemCode = #{itemCode}
